text: @GovMurphy #coronavirus isnt like other epidemics. There is no cure & both innate & active immunity don't work as it becomes NEW every time. Long term #lockdown causes #food problems & #riots when stocks deplete. ONLY solution is #segregation https://t.co/jTotblkKxT https://t.co/3eXLiyZ9J8
